name: Phonetime
overview: Phonetime Inc. is a diversified long distance telecommunications company established in 1994 to become one of the first companies in Canada to sell pre-paid calling cards. From this modest beginning, the Company now operates one of the largest privately held domestic telecommunications networks and a growing international network currently comprised of facilities in North America, Europe and Africa. With a scalable and redundant network platform comprised of traditional analog TDMA and digital VoIP technologies, managed with sophisticated proprietary software, Phonetime offers a full complement of retail long distance services across Canada and wholesale services to carriers around the world.
